JOB DESCRIPTION: Primary skills:      Strong in Java,  J2EE,  Spring 3.0,  Springboot,  Web Services (Restful and SOAP),  OOAD,  UML,  Design Pattern     Good understanding on Cloud Computing concept     Exposure to Agile Development.     Ability to mentor the team technically     Strong Investigation,  Analytical and Problem- Solving skills     Ability to identify key technical risks and develop mitigation and recovery plan      Secondary skills:      Knowledge of event- driven architecture and workflow management     Healthcare domain awareness     Responsibility & Key Result Areas     Analyze and understand the Software/Functional Requirements Specification     Create (detailed) design within specified top- level design/architecture     Provide technical guidance in a technical,  functional/domain area     Follow (detailed) design document to perform coding     Participate in peer reviews for project artifacts and ensure the quality of deliverables     Support in project estimation,  planning and risk management activities     Manage technical communication with Partners     Keep abreast of technical developments in own field through study,  technical contacts,  and propagates it     Act as a role model for other technical members in the group     Participate in PRP process improvement/tailoring    Role Competency     Good knowledge of OOAD and Design Patterns     Good drive on efficiency improvements at project level (change management)     Experience in all phases of software development life cycle     Experience with object- oriented programming languages in Java,  and eagerness to work with various mobile platforms i.e.,  HTML5,  iOS,  Android,  etc.     Experience in working in teams and in defining solutions that contribute towards a reusable/shared architecture     Personal Characteristics     Excellent oral and written communication skills     Detail oriented; ability to multitask     Self- starter and quick learner and ability to work with minimal supervision     Excellent team player
